name: gatsby-plugin-gitalk
description: A component for integrating Gitalk comments in Gatsby.
author: suziwen <suziwen1@gmail.com> (https://suziwen.github.io)

scripts.copy-files: mkdir lib || true && cp .eslintrc.json README.md package.json lib
scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn copy-files && babel src --out-dir lib --copy-files --ignore **/__tests__
scripts.npm-publish: git push --follow-tags origin master && yarn build && cd lib && npm --registry https://registry.npmjs.org publish && cd ../
